idea:
What is Client More?

Client More is a platform that helps small & medium enterprises build & maintain their social presence all at the comfort of a button, and that too without spending a bomb. We understand that due to lack of time & resources, many small businesses fail to build an impressive presence on social media, which affects their business. Client More aims to resolve this issue through an effective & easy-to-use platform.

What do we do?

We have a wide range of experience, and expertise to create and implement your social media strategy - to creating awesome content, to optmising it online. We not only connect you with your target audience, but also, generate content and optimise social media for you, so that you can concentrate on your business. In short, we make your Brand look world class and communicate effectively on Social Media.

Who can use Client More?

Anybody (personality or business) who wishes to build & maintain their social media presence can use Client More! So whether you are the new restaurant in town or an upcoming rockstar, Client More can help you be social!

Why choose Client More?

We understand SMBs and have a proven record of solving social media marketing puzzle for over 6+ clients since our inception.

Our leadership team has been a core part of SMBs focussed businesses like Just Dial, India Mart Pages as well as new age internet businesses like Snapdeal and VIVA Market we pin pointedly understand what SMBs need socially!

Since, your business is valuable, we sought out a strategic plan according to your business insight. Your business social media pages is a mirror to the services you render to your clients, hence it is essential to give it a perfect touch. Being the startup SMM agency in mumbai, we ensure to deliver services which lead to a profitable venture and much more. Count on us for Social media marketing, and ensure a perfect marketing plan customized by the top students in marketing only with us at Client More.

Having an expert team on panel is one of the reasons because of which Client More is a constant vendor on the client’s panel since their association. The strategies implemented and customized solutions provided make it an ideal package to suit SMBs
name: Client More Marketing Solutions

idea: Bharat Alt Fuel Pvt. Ltd. primarily focuses on alternative fuel technology & e-mobility. We believe in a self-sustained ecosystem of energy generation, preservation & transportation. Our e-mobility products are not just focused on ease of commute but we consider them as mobile power banks which can electrify residential or commercial establishments during SOS situations. At Bharat Alt Fuel we are passionate about self-sustained electric mobility. We can undertake Solar EPC-Turnkey projects along with energy-saving systems deployments involving majorly lithium-ion chemistry. Under an exclusive MOU with US based e-mobility company, we have our extended R&D center in the US for developing new-age e-mobility products.
name: BHARAT ALT FUEL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
INTERNATIONAL ACADEMY OF FITNESS SCIENCE LLP is a gradually growing Limited Liability Partnership started in the year 2021. Cynosure of the company is to serve the nation through their continuous, effective and efficient efforts in the field of fitness.

INTERNATIONAL ACADEMY OF FITNESS SCIENCE LLP – believes in fitness is the sound of the future.

IAFSC INTERNATIONAL ACADEMY OF FITNESS SCIENCE is the Trademark filled by the startup. INTERNATIONAL ACADEMY OF FITNESS SCIENCE LLP was incorporated on tenth day of August 2021 who’s LLPIN - AAY-1275. IAFSC INTERNATIONAL ACADEMY OF FITNESS SCIENCE is an ISO 9001:2015 registered organization whose number is IMS/IAFS/290921/829. The startup is providing fitness education classes, certification cources, health centres, yoga centres, immunization centres, massage houses, gymnasiums. The startup is promoting, establishing and building franchise physical fitness centres, physical training schools, fitness clubs and institutes. The startup is engaged in conducting courses for trainers, and instructors. The startup is also promoting, organising fitness exhibitions, cultural shows, fitness events either privately or publicly, or with the help of any statutory bodies or private persons/bodies. The startup believes and aims to transform fitness professional into health professionals by providing certificate courses in fitness.
name: INTERNATIONAL ACADEMY OF FITNESS SCIENCE LLP

idea: Our vision is to support the companies in building and developing new businesses of the future, and growing existing ones through innovative strategies and unique mechanisms while serving national and regional aspirations. Our mission is to serve our clients in managing their environments - Social, Economic, Financial, Political, Legal, Administrative, and Operational - to help them grow, increase the benefits to stakeholders, and propel them to greater heights.
name: PARAMONE BUSINESS ADVISORY LLP

idea:
METAMORPHICK SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED is a startup established in 2017 providing engineering IT solution to the infrastructure engineering community which includes owner operators, engineering and construction companies & software OEM's.

Company is based out of MUMBAI, INDIA and was incorporated by Industry professionals having more than 25+ years of experience.
name: METAMORPHICK SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are creating doctor formulated solutions that contain natural, organic, ayurvedic ingredients backed by BOTH scientific research & empirical evidence for efficacy & safety! We will be selling direct to the consumer through the internet, to give them the best prices.

idea: The computer sales and servicing industry includes operators that mainly sell and service all forms of computers such as desktops, laptops, notebooks, palmtops and software, as well as accessories like printers, scanners and keyboards.
name: JAYSHREE INFOTECH

idea: To commence and carry on the business of trading , export , import in foods and dry fruits , chivdas, processed foods, health foods, protein foods, food products, agro foods, fast foods, packed foods, poultry products, sea foods, milk foods, health and diet drinks, extruded foods, frozen foods, dehydrated foods, precooked foods, canned foods, preserved foods, bakery products and confectionery items such as breads, biscuits, sweets, cakes, pastries, cookies, wafers, condoles, lemon drops, chocolate, toffees, tinned fruits, vegetables, fruits, jams, jelly, pickles, squashes, sausages, nutrient, health and diet foods / drinks, extruded foods, confectionery items, sweets, cereals products and any other food products in India
name: MEHER TRADERS

idea:
HMI Furniture Factory Private Limited is a residential, commercial, and retail furniture manufacturer which designs and makes luxury, high-end furniture items. A unit of known company Home Makers Interior Designers And Decorators Private Limited who has been in the industry for 30+ years, HMI Furniture is ready to set foot and make its mark as the best customized furniture factory India has ever seen.

 

With a wide variety of designs and top finishes, we are committed to providing our esteemed customers with the topmost quality and VIP service.

 

Quick Delivery, N Number of Designs to choose from, Lush Quality, Grandeur Level of Assistance, No Cost EMI Options… These are just a few perks that we are always determined to offer.

 

Be it a new home you are moving into, or you would want to refurbish your current one, we are here to help you with infinite options. Laminate, Corian, PU finish, Veneer, and a lot more; you choose, we deliver.

 

From side tables to king-size beds and high-end kitchens, from coffee tables to multi-functional workstations, from display racks to cash counters, we have it all.
name: HMI FURNITURE FACTORY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: INNOVATIONS IN ADVISORY SOLUTIONS. WORKING OUT THE SYSTEM OF DELIVERING CUSTOMISED SOLUTIONS IN COMPLIANCE AND TAXATION
